name: loveyouforms
description: Cloud app to handle form submissions for one website or 1,000 using Firebase platform

## Scripts Notes #######################.databaseImport: you will need to run this once to import the starter database
## Scripts Notes #######################.databaseExport: you may never need this. exports production database and saves to local file 'exported.json'
## Scripts Notes #######################.fbdev: starts firebase local development emulators including database from functions/dev/database/

scripts.fbjest: npm run reqDev && firebase emulators:start --only firestore,functions  --import="./dev/database"
scripts.deploy: npm run reqProd && firebase deploy --only functions

## devDependencies Notes ###############.firestore-export-import: required once to import starter database
## devDependencies Notes ###############.fs: needed for script exportData, and dev/replace-string.js
